field.name: help
field.p: Click to define a new Case Sheet.
You can create and update Case Details and Tasks. You can assign Tasks for an Assignee.

field.name: help
field.p: You can register and track your workings hours by project every day. Every time spent on a project will become a cost in the analytic accounting/contract and can be re-invoiced to customers if required.

record.field: Inherit project Long Term form : CaseSheet Data

xpath.attribute: grey:state in ('cancelled','done');red:date_deadline and (date_deadline<current_date) and (state in ('draft','pending','open'));blue:date_deadline and (date_deadline==current_date) and (state in ('draft','pending','open'));black:date_deadline and (date_deadline>current_date) and (state in ('draft','pending','open'))
